Sentencas: Thin films of La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-(x+y)/2 were prepared by the electrophoretic deposition technique using acetone-containing iodine (750 mg I-1) as solvent medium.
Titulo: Fabrication of La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-(x+y)/2 thin films by electrophoretic deposition and its conductivity measurement

Sentencas: Between each deposition sintering was performed for 1 h duration at various temperatures, of 100 degrees intervals, in the range 1273-1673 K.
Titulo: Fabrication of La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-(x+y)/2 thin films by electrophoretic deposition and its conductivity measurement

Sentencas: At temperatures below 1673 K, the deposited films did not sinter well and were porous.
Titulo: Fabrication of La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-(x+y)/2 thin films by electrophoretic deposition and its conductivity measurement

Sentencas: Dense films with uniform thickness of 4 mu m were obtained after five repetitions of deposition and sintering at 1673 K.
Titulo: Fabrication of La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-(x+y)/2 thin films by electrophoretic deposition and its conductivity measurement

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of the film was measured using an ac impedance bridge.
Titulo: Fabrication of La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-(x+y)/2 thin films by electrophoretic deposition and its conductivity measurement

Sentencas: The conductivity of the films is comparable with that of bulk samples.
Titulo: Fabrication of La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-(x+y)/2 thin films by electrophoretic deposition and its conductivity measurement
Fabrication of La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-(x+y)/2 thin films by electrophoretic deposition and its conductivity measurement
